title: Three Little Girls

thumbnail.alt_text: Painting of three light-skinned girls in a woodland setting. A dog in the foreground faces a girl with a puppy in her lap.

artist_display:
Narcisse Virgile Diaz de la Peña
French, 1807-1876

provenance_text:
Possibly Thurber Fine Arts, Chicago [based on a label on the back of the painting].
Henry Field (died 1890), Chicago; his widow Mrs. Florence Lathrop Field; given to the Art Institute, 1894.
